text: -  Surgery. Radiation therapy and/or chemotherapy may be given before or after surgery.      - A clinical trial of gene therapy.      - A clinical trial of targeted therapy, radiation therapy, and surgery with or without chemotherapy.       - A clinical trial of targeted therapy (histone methyltransferase inhibitor).       - A clinical trial of an antibody-drug conjugate.                   Undifferentiated/unclassified sarcoma     These tumors include undifferentiated pleomorphic sarcoma /malign
